my favorite book is jane austen s pride and prejudice.

participant_2.background:
My favorite websites are pet health sites, especially ones with information on poodles.
i enjoy watching tennis and golf on tv.
i read a lot.
i am a guy that enjoys being a guy.
i am short.

content.text: Hi there! I am a great listener and I always have my kids' backs. My favorite book is Jane Austen's Pride and Prejudice. I am bipolar and I have three roommates.
Hi there! I enjoy watching tennis and golf on TV and reading a lot. I am a guy that enjoys being a guy. I am short.
What kind of books do you like to read?
I read a lot of different genres, but my favorite is probably nonfiction.
Me too! I love learning new things. What is your favorite nonfiction book?
I recently read a book about the history of tennis and I really enjoyed it.
That sounds really interesting! I love learning about history.
I am also a big fan of poodles. I have three of them.
Poodles are so cute! I have always wanted one.
They are great dogs! They are very smart and affectionate.
I am sure your poodles are very happy to have you as their owner.
They are very lucky to have me!
I am sure you are a great dog owner!
Thanks! I try my best.
It sounds like you have a lot of great hobbies and interests.
I like to keep busy! What do you like to do for fun?
I love to spend time with my kids. I also enjoy reading, listening to music, and watching movies.
It sounds like we have a lot in common!
I think so too!
It was nice talking to you!
You too!
